page.title: 18LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: {Kilsby W.I.}There are 51 members who meet on the 2nd Wednesday in the month at the Village Hall. The membership fee is Â£4.00 per year. The Committee that runs the W.I. consists of 10 people including a Chairman,Secretary and Treasurer.Each meeting the ladies have a guest speaker to share his/her talents or hobbies.They also raise money for charity.{Crick W.I.}is run in a similar way. {Cubs,Brownies,Scouts and Guides. Children from both Kilsby and Crick attend these organisations.They hold meetings once a week at which they have games activities and also work towards winning badges for various activities.They also have the opportunity to go away to camp and the equipment is bought with money raised at such events as the Gang show, Jumble Sales and the weekly subs.
